body_html: wchan@, I was able to build successfully by following the "Installing from sources" instructions. This seems more like a Bazel issue than a TF issue. Make sure you have Bazel 0.1.1. Perhaps try a bazel clean and try building again.

body: wchan@, I was able to build successfully by following the "Installing from sources" instructions. This seems more like a Bazel issue than a TF issue. Make sure you have Bazel 0.1.1. Perhaps try a `bazel clean` and try building again.
